string-array.name: msgs_without_virus
string-array.item: What\'s up bro?
Finally the good weather
Somebody get these noisy neighbors off of me
Yesterday watched Game of Thrones, hope it\'s gonna keep it up
Yo I bought a new laptop. Now choosing games to play
Looking forward to upcoming Champions League match
Woohoo! Vacation time, going to Ireland
What to do with computer, it can\'t manage with 4k video
So nice to relax with cup of tea in Hookah Bar
Went to yoga with my wife, I\'m so happy :(
My cat is so annoying, he\'s screaming all night long. What to do with him?
Y\'all guys checked new masks in Instagram?
They increased prices again!!..
Weather, what is your problem?
Where can I go with incomplete higher education?
When is autumn conscription?
Heard about government procurement for information security increasing?
Wanna go home
LEEEEEROY JENKINSSSSSS
Chicken or the egg?
I\'m thinking #me #thinking #thoughts
Oceania had always been at war with Eastasia!
Oceania had never been at war with Eastasia!
Youtube, you are disappointing me

string-array.name: msgs_start_virus
string-array.item: Phone started to lag
I have some weird loading screen
My computer is so laggy at loading stage
Damn I think I got a virus somewhere
Somebody heard about new virus?
Antivirus stopped updating. Am I the one?
My computer is brand new but RAM is already not enough
How much is the antivirus?
Give me advice about antivirus please
Phone says that it has been rooted…
I\'ve never had any virus
What the! Saw a text on the phone screen: %@
Read about new virus: %@. Thank God I have an antivirus!

string-array.name: msgs_theft_bank
string-array.item: Weird, some contacts from Contact List disappeared
Somebody knows why some contacts are showed incorrectly?
Phone sends calls by itself..
Grandma, I didn\'t call!

string-array.name: msgs_app_access
string-array.item: Guys I have a problem, apps are downloading by themselves (
Weird I got a second app store icon
Damn according to logs there is too much calls to the same URL
Battery is dying too fast!
Need to fix phone at service center(

string-array.name: msgs_sms
string-array.item: Checked today, 2 messages were sent to unknown numbers

string-array.name: msgs_money_transfer
string-array.item: My bank notified me about money transfer 100$ to unknown person!
How to block a card?
Can I run a negative balance on my card?
Thank God I keep money under pillow
Thank God I keep money in bitcoins
I don\'t have money anyway
Where is the nearest ATM?
Gonna file a lawsuit against bank
Where is my money?

string-array.name: msgs_block_ad
string-array.item: Why is there ads on the lock screen?
Ads everywhere
Guys how to remove ads?

string-array.name: msgs_banner
string-array.item: Damned virus, there is banner with payment requirement

string-array.name: msgs_porno_banner
string-array.item: GODDAMN I\'m writing from wife phone! I got a porno banner and I can\'t hide it!
Extortionists! But I have no other choice but to pay(
I hope my mom didn\'t see it!
